ðŸ“– Summary: Superseedr is a terminal-based BitTorrent client written in Rust, utilizing the Ratatui library for its user interface. It offers core BitTorrent functionalities such as peer discovery, rarest-first piece selection, and a tit-for-tat choking algorithm, along with a real-time dashboard and configuration management features.
